CustomField.description: This field reports all products and modules as Business Acceptance, Confidentiality, Integration, LegalKey, or Time
CustomField.formula: CASE(Product_Line__c, "DTE Axiom","Time", "Conflicts - On Prem","Business Acceptance", "Intake - On Prem","Business Acceptance", "Intapp Open - Lateral Hire","Business Acceptance", "Time - On Prem","Time", "Intapp Time","Time", "Integrate - On Prem","Integration", "Integration Builder","Integration", "Records Management","LegalKey", "TFG - Legacy","LegalKey", "Time Builder","Time", "Wall Builder","Confidentiality", "Walls - On Prem","Confidentiality", "Flow & Intake Bundle","Flow & Intake Bundle", "Intapp Open - Terms of Business","Business Acceptance", "Time - Cloud","Time", "Intapp Time - Cloud","Time", "Terms - Cloud","Business Acceptance", "Terms - On Prem","Business Acceptance", "Intake - Cloud","Business Acceptance", "Intapp Open - Intake - Cloud","Business Acceptance", "Conflicts - Cloud","Business Acceptance", "LegalKey - Legacy","LegalKey", "Experience - On Prem","Experience", "Experience - Cloud","Experience", "Integrate - Cloud","Integration", "Multiple Products - On Prem","Multiple Products", "Pricing - On Prem","Pricing", "Pricing - Cloud", "Pricing", "Intapp Open - Sandbox","Intapp Open - Sandbox", "Third Party Product - D&B","Third Party Product", "Third Party Product - Experience","Third Party Product", "Intapp Open - Workflow","Business Acceptance", "Open","Business Acceptance", "Conflicts","Business Acceptance", "Intake","Business Acceptance", "Relationships - Cloud","Relationships", "Relationships - On Prem","Relationships", "Time Entry","Time", "CRM - Cloud","CRM", "Intapp Open","Business Acceptance", "Intapp Time Cloud","Time", "Unknown" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field reports all products and modules as Business Acceptance, Confidentiality, Integration, LegalKey, or Time
CustomField.label: Product Line - Simple
